verses.arabic: لَوْ أَنزَلْنَا هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٍ لَّرَأَيْتَهُ خَاشِعًا مُّتَصَدِّعًا مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ
verses.english: Had We sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah.
verses.urdu: Agar humne yeh Quran kisi pahad par bhi utaar diya hota to tum dekhte ke woh Allah ke khauf se daba jaa raha hai, aur phata padta hai.

verses.arabic: هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ۖ هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
verses.urdu: Allah! Uska siva koi ibadat ke laayak nahin, woh zinda hai, sab kuch chalaane waala hai.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.
verses.urdu: Yeh Allah ki kitaab hai, is mein koi shak nahin, hidayat hai un parheizgaar logon ke liye.

verses.english: Indeed, We have granted you, O Prophet, abundant goodness.
verses.urdu: (Ay Nabi) Beshak, Humne tumhein kausar ata kiya.

verses.english: He said, "Who is the Lord of you all, O Moses?"
verses.urdu: Firaun ne kaha "aacha, to phir tum dono ka Rabb kaun hai ay Musa?"

verses.arabic: أُولَٰئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًى مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.english: Those are upon guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
verses.urdu: Aise log apne Rabb ki taraf se raah e raast par hain aur wahi falah paane wale hain.

verses.english: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
verses.urdu: Tumne dekha us shakhs ko jo aakhirat ki jaza o saza ko jhutlata hai?

verses.english: I do not worship what you worship.
verses.urdu: Main unki ibadat nahin karta jinki ibadat tum karte ho.

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَاهُ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ فِي الْفُلْكِ وَأَغْرَقْنَا الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا عَمِينَ
verses.english: But they still rejected him, so We saved him and those with him in the ship and made the disbelievers drown. Indeed, they were a people blind.
verses.urdu: Unhon ne usay jhutlaya aur nae yaqeen na kiya, to hum ne usay aur un logon ko jo uske saath the janaash (successors) bacha liya, aur sab ko garq (drown) kar diya jin hone muntazeb the (warned). (Warna kya gaya) us par bhi unho ne maan kar na.

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.english: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
verses.urdu: Ay Insan kis cheez ne tujhe apne us Rabb-e-kareem ki taraf se dhoke mein daal diya.
